io.micronaut.management.endpoint.annotation

Annotation Type Write


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Executable
public @interface Write
    A method designed to annotate an Endpoint write operation.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String[] consumes 
      java.lang.String description 
      java.lang.String[] produces 

    • Element Detail

      • description

        public abstract java.lang.String description
        Returns:
        Description of the operation
        Default:
        ""

      • produces

        @AliasFor(annotationName="io.micronaut.http.annotation.Produces",
          member="value")
public abstract java.lang.String[] produces
        Returns:
        The produced MediaType values. Defaults to application/json
        Default:
        "application/json"

      • consumes

        @AliasFor(annotationName="io.micronaut.http.annotation.Consumes",
          member="value")
public abstract java.lang.String[] consumes
        Returns:
        The consumed MediaType for request bodies Defaults to application/json
        Default:
        "application/json"
